VEH_MAINT_EXCEPTION
Definition Maintenance items that are unique to one vehicle. Each item supercedes an equivalent point on the maintenance schedule for the manufacturer/model/series of the vehicle.
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE VEH_MAINT_EXCEPTION(
     VEHICLE_ID                 numeric(5, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     MAINT_TASK_ID              numeric(5, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     ODOMETER                   numeric(7, 0)     NULL,
     OPERATION_DAY_INTERVAL     numeric(7, 0)     NULL,
     OPERATION_MILES            numeric(7, 0)     NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKVEH_MAINT_EXCEPTION PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (VEHICLE_ID,MAINT_TASK_ID)
     ON MAIN_INDX,
     CONSTRAINT FKMAINT_TASK_VEH_MAINT_ECXP FOREIGN KEY (MAINT_TASK_ID)
     REFERENCES MAINTENANCE_TASK(MAINT_TASK_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKVEH_VEH_MAINT_EXCEPTION FOREIGN KEY (VEHICLE_ID)
     REFERENCES VEHICLE(VEHICLE_ID)
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
VEHICLE_ID numeric(5, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
MAINT_TASK_ID numeric(5, 0) NO The unique, system-assigned identifier for each general maintenance task.
ODOMETER numeric(7, 0) YES The odometer reading at which this maintenance should be performed.
OPERATION_DAY_INTERVAL numeric(7, 0) YES The frequency for this work expressed in operating days.
OPERATION_MILES numeric(7, 0) YES The frequency for this work expressed in operating miles.

Primary and Unique Keys
Key Name Key Type Keys
XPKVEH_MAINT_EXCEPTION PrimaryKey VEHICLE_ID,MAINT_TASK_ID

Foreign Keys
Parent Table Child Table Type Foreign Keys
MAINTENANCE_TASK VEH_MAINT_EXCEPTION Identifying MAINT_TASK_ID
VEHICLE VEH_MAINT_EXCEPTION Identifying VEHICLE_ID

Storage
STORAGE OPTION STORAGE VALUE
FILEGROUP MAIN_DATA

VEH_MALFUNCTION_FILTER
Definition A list of vehicle problems, or malfunctions. This table serves to suppress messages that are generated from a known problem with the vehicle.
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE VEH_MALFUNCTION_FILTER(
     VEHICLE_ID          numeric(5, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     MESSAGE_TYPE_ID     numeric(3, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     PROBLEM_TEXT        varchar(20)       NULL,
     FILTER_DATA         varbinary(10)     NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKVEH_MALFUNCTION_FILTER PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (VEHICLE_ID,MESSAGE_TYPE_ID)
     ON MAIN_INDX,
     CONSTRAINT FKMSG_TYPE_VEH_MALF_FILTER FOREIGN KEY (MESSAGE_TYPE_ID)
     REFERENCES MESSAGE_TYPE(MESSAGE_TYPE_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKVEH_VEH_MALFUNC_FILTER FOREIGN KEY (VEHICLE_ID)
     REFERENCES VEHICLE(VEHICLE_ID)
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
VEHICLE_ID numeric(5, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
MESSAGE_TYPE_ID numeric(3, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
PROBLEM_TEXT varchar(20) YES A free-form text field to document malfunctioning equipment on a vehicle.
FILTER_DATA varbinary(10) YES

Primary and Unique Keys
Key Name Key Type Keys
XPKVEH_MALFUNCTION_FILTER PrimaryKey VEHICLE_ID,MESSAGE_TYPE_ID

Foreign Keys
Parent Table Child Table Type Foreign Keys

VEHICLE VEH_MALFUNCTION_FILTER Identifying VEHICLE_ID

Storage
STORAGE OPTION STORAGE VALUE
FILEGROUP MAIN_DATA

VEH_SERVICE_STATUS
Definition A list of values that can be assigned to a vehicle to identify the type of service the vehicle can support. Ex. full service, limited service, or completely unavailable.
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE VEH_SERVICE_STATUS(
     VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_ID       numeric(3, 0)     NOT NULL,
     VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_TEXT     varchar(100)      NOT NULL,
     VEH_AVAILABILITY_FLAG       numeric(1, 0)     NULL,
     DISPLAY_ORDER               numeric(3, 0)     NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKVEH_SERVICE_STATUS PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_ID)
     ON MAIN_INDX
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_ID numeric(3, 0) NO The unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_TEXT varchar(100) NO This attribute defines the specific status of a vehicle. Ex. on order, full service, in maintenance, old, irritating -- but not dangerous mechanical faults, destroyed, sold .

The user may see this, or the more general availability category (veh_service_cat_text) as the \"status\" of a vehicle.
VEH_AVAILABILITY_FLAG numeric(1, 0) YES Specifies the availability of a vehicle when assigned this service status.

0 - Unavailable
1 - Available
2 - Limited Availability
DISPLAY_ORDER numeric(3, 0) YES Override the display order of this item for a list.

Primary and Unique Keys
Key Name Key Type Keys
XPKVEH_SERVICE_STATUS PrimaryKey VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_ID

Foreign Keys
Parent Table Child Table Type Foreign Keys
VEH_SERVICE_STATUS VEHICLE Non-Identifying VEHICLE_ID

Storage
STORAGE OPTION STORAGE VALUE
FILEGROUP MAIN_DATA

VEHICLE
Definition The inventory of vehicles owned by the transit company. This includes a revenue vehicle or other related vehicle such as security or administration.
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE VEHICLE(
     VEHICLE_ID                   numeric(5, 0)     NOT NULL,
     FLEET_ID                     numeric(5, 0)     NULL,
     TO_PROFILE_ID                numeric(5, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NULL,
     ROUTE_PROFILE_ID             numeric(5, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NULL,
     VLU_PROFILE_ID               numeric(5, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NULL,
     EQUIP_PROFILE_ID             numeric(5, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NULL,
     TRANSIT_DIV_ID               numeric(3, 0)     DEFAULT 1 NULL,
     PROPERTY_TAG                 varchar(20)       NULL,
     MFG_MODEL_SERIES_ID          numeric(3, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_ID        numeric(3, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     VEHICLE_TYPE_ID              numeric(3, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     VEHICLE_BASE_ID              numeric(3, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     RNET_ADDRESS                 numeric(5, 0)     NULL,
     VIN                          varchar(20)       NULL,
     LICENSE_PLATE                varchar(20)       NULL,
     MODEL_YEAR                   numeric(4, 0)     NULL,
     ODOMETER_MILEAGE             numeric(9, 0)     NULL,
     ODOMTR_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP      datetime          NULL,
     ODOMTR_UPDATE_SOURCE_IND     varchar(1)        NULL,
     GENERAL_INFORMATION          varchar(2000)     NULL,
     LOAD_ID                      numeric(3, 0)     NULL,
     RADIO_LID                    numeric(8, 0)     NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKVEHICLE PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (VEHICLE_ID)
     ON MAIN_INDX,
     CONSTRAINT FKBASE_FLEET_VEHICLE FOREIGN KEY (FLEET_ID)
     REFERENCES BASE_FLEET(FLEET_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKEQUIP_PROFILE_VEHICLE FOREIGN KEY (EQUIP_PROFILE_ID)
     REFERENCES EQUIPMENT_PROFILE(EQUIP_PROFILE_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKMFG_MODEL_SERIES_VEHICLE FOREIGN KEY (MFG_MODEL_SERIES_ID)
     REFERENCES MFG_MODEL_SERIES(MFG_MODEL_SERIES_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKRADIO_LOAD_VEHICLE FOREIGN KEY (LOAD_ID)
     REFERENCES RADIO_LOAD(LOAD_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKROUTE_PROFILE_VEHICLE FOREIGN KEY (ROUTE_PROFILE_ID)
     REFERENCES ROUTE_PROFILE(ROUTE_PROFILE_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKTIME_OUT_PROFILE_VEHICLE FOREIGN KEY (TO_PROFILE_ID)
     REFERENCES TIME_OUT_PROFILE(TO_PROFILE_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKTRANSIT_DIV_VEHICLE FOREIGN KEY (TRANSIT_DIV_ID)
     REFERENCES TRANSIT_DIVISION(TRANSIT_DIV_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKVEH_SERVICE_STAT_VEH FOREIGN KEY (VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_ID)
     REFERENCES VEH_SERVICE_STATUS(VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKVEHICLE_BASE_VEHICLE FOREIGN KEY (VEHICLE_BASE_ID)
     REFERENCES VEHICLE_BASE(VEHICLE_BASE_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKVEHICLE_TYPE_VEHICLE FOREIGN KEY (VEHICLE_TYPE_ID)
     REFERENCES VEHICLE_TYPE(VEHICLE_TYPE_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKVLU_PROFILE_VEHICLE FOREIGN KEY (VLU_PROFILE_ID)
     REFERENCES VLU_PROFILE(VLU_PROFILE_ID)
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
VEHICLE_ID numeric(5, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
FLEET_ID numeric(5, 0) YES
TO_PROFILE_ID numeric(5, 0) YES Mobile system configuration.
ROUTE_PROFILE_ID numeric(5, 0) YES A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
VLU_PROFILE_ID numeric(5, 0) YES A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
EQUIP_PROFILE_ID numeric(5, 0) YES A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
TRANSIT_DIV_ID numeric(3, 0) YES A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
PROPERTY_TAG varchar(20) YES The property tag, or identification for the vehicle.
MFG_MODEL_SERIES_ID numeric(3, 0) NO The unique code that defines a vehicle manufacturer, model, and series.
VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_ID numeric(3, 0) NO The unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
VEHICLE_TYPE_ID numeric(3, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
VEHICLE_BASE_ID numeric(3, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
RNET_ADDRESS numeric(5, 0) YES The identifier for the onboard system that is transmitted from the R/VLU. If this unit is replaced on a vehicle, the chassis ID module will
always remember this number.
VIN varchar(20) YES Vehicle Identification Number -- \"a structured combination of characters assigned to a vehicle by the manufacturer for identification purposes.\" (ISO 3779-1977 (E))
LICENSE_PLATE varchar(20) YES The license plate affixed to the vehicle that is provided by the department of transportation.
MODEL_YEAR numeric(4, 0) YES The manufacturer's model year for this vehicle.
ODOMETER_MILEAGE numeric(9, 0) YES Mechanical odomotor reading. Updated by mileage from MDT or from actual reading.
ODOMTR_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP datetime YES The last date and time the odomotor mileage was updated.
ODOMTR_UPDATE_SOURCE_IND varchar(1) YES The source of the odometer reading - message or maintenance technician.
GENERAL_INFORMATION varchar(2000) YES A free-form text area to record comments about a vehicle.
LOAD_ID numeric(3, 0) YES
RADIO_LID numeric(8, 0) YES The LID (Logical ID) assigned to each EDACS radio which allows dispatchers to make private calls (versus the partyline talkgroups).

Primary and Unique Keys
Key Name Key Type Keys
XIE1VEHICLE Index RNET_ADDRESS
XPKVEHICLE PrimaryKey VEHICLE_ID

ROUTE_PROFILE VEHICLE Non-Identifying ROUTE_PROFILE_ID

TRANSIT_DIVISION VEHICLE Non-Identifying TRANSIT_DIV_ID
VEH_SERVICE_STATUS VEHICLE Non-Identifying VEH_SERVICE_STATUS_ID
VEHICLE_BASE VEHICLE Non-Identifying VEHICLE_BASE_ID
VEHICLE_TYPE VEHICLE Non-Identifying VEHICLE_TYPE_ID
VLU_PROFILE VEHICLE Non-Identifying VLU_PROFILE_ID
VEHICLE VEH_MAINT_EXCEPTION Identifying VEHICLE_ID

VEHICLE_AK1
Definition A shadow table for the VEHICLE table that keeps track of the unique rnet_address values.
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE VEHICLE_AK1(
     RNET_ADDRESS     numeric(5, 0)     NOT NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKVEHICLE_AK1 PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (RNET_ADDRESS)
     ON MAIN_INDX
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
RNET_ADDRESS numeric(5, 0) NO NOT NULL values of rnet_address that exist in the VEHICLE table.

Foreign Keys

VEHICLE_EQUIP_XREF
Definition Each entry represents an equipment item that exists for a vehicle.
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE VEHICLE_EQUIP_XREF(
     VEHICLE_ID           numeric(5, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     VEHICLE_EQUIP_ID     numeric(5, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     SERIAL_NUMBER        varchar(20)       NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKVEHICLE_EQUIP_XREF PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (VEHICLE_ID,VEHICLE_EQUIP_ID)
     ON MAIN_INDX,
     CONSTRAINT FKVEH_EQUIP_VEH_EQUIP_X FOREIGN KEY (VEHICLE_EQUIP_ID)
     REFERENCES VEHICLE_EQUIPMENT(VEHICLE_EQUIP_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKVEHICLE_VEHICLE_EQUIP_X FOREIGN KEY (VEHICLE_ID)
     REFERENCES VEHICLE(VEHICLE_ID)
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
VEHICLE_ID numeric(5, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
VEHICLE_EQUIP_ID numeric(5, 0) NO The unique, system-assigned identifier for each vehicle equipment item.
SERIAL_NUMBER varchar(20) YES Property tag, or identification of the equipment.

Primary and Unique Keys
Key Name Key Type Keys
XPKVEHICLE_EQUIP_XREF PrimaryKey VEHICLE_ID,VEHICLE_EQUIP_ID

Foreign Keys
Parent Table Child Table Type Foreign Keys

VEHICLE_GROUP_XREF
Definition This table associates a vehicle with one or more vehicle groups. This is used by BusOps to broadcast messages.
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE VEHICLE_GROUP_XREF(
     VEHICLE_GROUP_ID     numeric(5, 0)     NOT NULL,
     VEHICLE_ID           numeric(5, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKVEHICLE_GROUP_XREF PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (VEHICLE_GROUP_ID,VEHICLE_ID)
     ON MAIN_INDX,
     CONSTRAINT FKVEHICLE_GRP_VEHICLE_GRP_X FOREIGN KEY (VEHICLE_GROUP_ID)
     REFERENCES VEHICLE_GROUP(VEHICLE_GROUP_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKVEHICLE_VEHICLE_GROUP_X FOREIGN KEY (VEHICLE_ID)
     REFERENCES VEHICLE(VEHICLE_ID)
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
VEHICLE_GROUP_ID numeric(5, 0) NO The unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
VEHICLE_ID numeric(5, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.

VEHICLE_MILES_HOURS
Definition Reporting. This table is sourced from the TMDailyLog..time_point_crossing and related tables.
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE VEHICLE_MILES_HOURS(
     CALENDAR_ID             numeric(10, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NULL,
     VEHICLE_ID              numeric(5, 0)      DEFAULT 0 NULL,
     REVENUE_MILES           numeric(10, 0)     NULL,
     NON_REVENUE_MILES       numeric(10, 0)     NULL,
     REVENUE_SECONDS         numeric(15, 0)     NULL,
     NON_REVENUE_SECONDS     numeric(15, 0)     NULL,
     CONSTRAINT [R/552] FOREIGN KEY (CALENDAR_ID)
     REFERENCES SERVICE_CALENDAR(CALENDAR_ID),
     CONSTRAINT [R/553] FOREIGN KEY (VEHICLE_ID)
     REFERENCES VEHICLE(VEHICLE_ID)
) ON REPORTING_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
CALENDAR_ID numeric(10, 0) YES Service day.
VEHICLE_ID numeric(5, 0) YES The vehicle that logged the miles.
REVENUE_MILES numeric(10, 0) YES Computed from logged odometer readings.
NON_REVENUE_MILES numeric(10, 0) YES Computed from logged odometer readings.
REVENUE_SECONDS numeric(15, 0) YES Computed from logged arrival times.
NON_REVENUE_SECONDS numeric(15, 0) YES Computed from logged arrival times.

Primary and Unique Keys
Key Name Key Type Keys

Foreign Keys
Parent Table Child Table Type Foreign Keys
SERVICE_CALENDAR VEHICLE_MILES_HOURS Non-Identifying CALENDAR_ID
VEHICLE VEHICLE_MILES_HOURS Non-Identifying VEHICLE_ID

Storage
STORAGE OPTION STORAGE VALUE
FILEGROUP REPORTING_DATA

Examples:

Automobile

VISUAL
Definition
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE VISUAL(
     ANNOUNCE_ID        numeric(5, 0)     NOT NULL,
     SEQUENCE_INDEX     int               NOT NULL,
     TEXT_SIGN_DATA     varchar(255)      NULL,
     INTERNAL           smallint          NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKVISUAL PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (ANNOUNCE_ID,SEQUENCE_INDEX)
     ON MAIN_INDX,
     CONSTRAINT FKAUDIO_VISUAL FOREIGN KEY (ANNOUNCE_ID,SEQUENCE_INDEX)
     REFERENCES AUDIO(ANNOUNCE_ID,SEQUENCE_INDEX)
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition

SEQUENCE_INDEX int NO A sequential number to make a unique key.
TEXT_SIGN_DATA varchar(255) YES
INTERNAL smallint YES

VLU_PROFILE
Definition Each record represents a configuration profile pertaining to a VLU ( vehicle logic unit, or mobil processor).
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE VLU_PROFILE(
     VLU_PROFILE_ID              numeric(5, 0)      NOT NULL,
     PROFILE_NAME                varchar(20)        NULL,
     FIXED_MODE                  varchar(20)        NULL,
     SUB_MODE                    varchar(20)        NULL,
     TIME_DISPLAY_FORMAT         varchar(20)        NULL,
     TIME_ZONE                   varchar(20)        NULL,
     DEAD_RECKONER_MODE          varchar(20)        NULL,
     UNIT_ID                     varchar(20)        NULL,
     NETWORK_TYPE                varchar(20)        NULL,
     ODOMETER_CAL_LO             varchar(20)        NULL,
     BROADCAST_ID                varchar(20)        NULL,
     TRANSIT_CO_ID               varchar(20)        NULL,
     DEFAULT_PAMIC_INPUT         varchar(20)        NULL,
     SCHED_ADHERE_TIME           numeric(10, 0)     NULL,
     DEFAULT_BRIGHTNESS          varchar(20)        NULL,
     DEFAULT_CONTRAST            varchar(20)        NULL,
     DEFAULT_DATA_CHANNEL        varchar(20)        NULL,
     DEFAULT_VOICE_CHANNEL       varchar(20)        NULL,
     DEFAULT_SUPV_CHANNEL        varchar(20)        NULL,
     AUTO_SWITCH_MC_PAGE         varchar(20)        NULL,
     SPEED_LIMIT                 varchar(20)        NULL,
     AUTO_RTT_PT_CANCEL          varchar(20)        NULL,
     DOWNLOAD_ENABLES            varchar(20)        NULL,
     LVA_LONG_INT_MSG_OFFSET     varchar(20)        NULL,
     ODOMETER_CAL_HI             varchar(20)        NULL,
     LVA_LONG_EXT_MSG_OFFSET     varchar(20)        NULL,
     LVA_LONG_SAF_MSG_OFFSET     varchar(20)        NULL,
     NO_PT_FARE_PAGE             varchar(20)        NULL,
     MOMENTARY_OVERT_KEY         varchar(20)        NULL,
     UPDATE_TIMESTAMP            datetime           NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKVLU_PROFILE PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (VLU_PROFILE_ID)
     ON MAIN_INDX
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
VLU_PROFILE_ID numeric(5, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
PROFILE_NAME varchar(20) YES The text description, or user-assigned identifier for a profile.
FIXED_MODE varchar(20) YES DataRoute, Voice, Supervisor. (eeprom.h 500)
SUB_MODE varchar(20) YES FixedRoute, Paratransit, etc. (eeprom.h 501)
TIME_DISPLAY_FORMAT varchar(20) YES (eeprom.h 502)
TIME_ZONE varchar(20) YES (eeprom.h 503)
DEAD_RECKONER_MODE varchar(20) YES (eeprom.h 504)
UNIT_ID varchar(20) YES Vehicle ID (eeprom.h 505)
NETWORK_TYPE varchar(20) YES 1=edac 2=CR default=TDMA (eeprom.h 506)
ODOMETER_CAL_LO varchar(20) YES Odometer calibration factor. (eeprom.h 507) 522 is the high word
BROADCAST_ID varchar(20) YES EDACS Broadcast Group ID (eeprom.h 508)
TRANSIT_CO_ID varchar(20) YES TSite site (eeprom.h 509)
DEFAULT_PAMIC_INPUT varchar(20) YES handset or gooseneck (eeprom.h 510)
SCHED_ADHERE_TIME numeric(10, 0) YES 0 to 99 minutes (eeprom.h 511)
DEFAULT_BRIGHTNESS varchar(20) YES Used for normal startup default brightness (eeprom.h 512)
DEFAULT_CONTRAST varchar(20) YES Used for normal startup default contrast (eeprom.h 513)
DEFAULT_DATA_CHANNEL varchar(20) YES (eeprom.h 514)
DEFAULT_VOICE_CHANNEL varchar(20) YES (eeprom.h 515)
DEFAULT_SUPV_CHANNEL varchar(20) YES (eeprom.h 516)
AUTO_SWITCH_MC_PAGE varchar(20) YES Boolean -- enables auto-switching to manual counter page (eeprom.h 517)
SPEED_LIMIT varchar(20) YES Speed over which alarm is sent. (eeprom.h 518)
AUTO_RTT_PT_CANCEL varchar(20) YES True/False causes paratransit to load TalkPage and send RTT on NOSHOW and CANCEL. (eeprom.h 519)
DOWNLOAD_ENABLES varchar(20) YES Determines if files are to be downloaded and/or rebuilt. (eeprom.h 520)
LVA_LONG_INT_MSG_OFFSET varchar(20) YES If non-zero, indicates factor to be added to stop announcement for second half of internal message. (eeprom.h 521)
ODOMETER_CAL_HI varchar(20) YES Odometer calibration factor high word (507 is low word) (eeprom.h 522)
LVA_LONG_EXT_MSG_OFFSET varchar(20) YES If non-zero, indicates factor to be added to announcement index for second half of external message. (eeprom.h 523)
LVA_LONG_SAF_MSG_OFFSET varchar(20) YES If non-zero, indicates factor to be added to announcement index for second half of safety message. (eeprom.h 524)
NO_PT_FARE_PAGE varchar(20) YES If = 1 the fare page will not appear in paratransit mode. (eeprom.h 525)
MOMENTARY_OVERT_KEY varchar(20) YES Set to 1 if a momentary overt key has been installed. (eeprom.h 526)
UPDATE_TIMESTAMP datetime YES

Primary and Unique Keys
Key Name Key Type Keys
XPKVLU_PROFILE PrimaryKey VLU_PROFILE_ID

Foreign Keys
Parent Table Child Table Type Foreign Keys
VLU_PROFILE VEHICLE Non-Identifying VEHICLE_ID

Storage
STORAGE OPTION STORAGE VALUE
FILEGROUP MAIN_DATA

WA_ROLE_FLEET_XREF
Definition The fleets assigned to a work assignment role for a dispatcher.
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE WA_ROLE_FLEET_XREF(
     CONFIGURATION_ID     numeric(10, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     ROLE_ID              numeric(10, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     FLEET_ID             numeric(5, 0)      DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKWA_ROLE_FLEET_XREF PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (CONFIGURATION_ID,ROLE_ID,FLEET_ID)
     ON MAIN_INDX,
     CONSTRAINT FKFLEET_WA_ROLE_FLEET_X FOREIGN KEY (FLEET_ID)
     REFERENCES FLEET(FLEET_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKWA_ROLE_WA_ROLE_FLEET_X FOREIGN KEY (CONFIGURATION_ID,ROLE_ID)
     REFERENCES WORK_ASSIGNMENT_ROLE(CONFIGURATION_ID,ROLE_ID)
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
CONFIGURATION_ID numeric(10, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each row.
ROLE_ID numeric(10, 0) NO
FLEET_ID numeric(5, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.

Parent Table Child Table Type Foreign Keys

WORK_ASSIGNMENT_CONFIGURATION
Definition The work assignment configuration of dispatcher roles. One or more roles are assigned to each dispatcher by the dispatcher supervisor.
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE WORK_ASSIGNMENT_CONFIGURATION(
     CONFIGURATION_ID               numeric(10, 0)     NOT NULL,
     CONFIGURATION_NAME             varchar(100)       NOT NULL,
     FILE_VERSION                   varchar(8)         NULL,
     ROLES_VERSION                  varchar(8)         NULL,
     DEFAULT_ASSIGN_VERSION         varchar(8)         NULL,
     FORCE_ASSIGNMENT_IND           varchar(1)         NULL,
     DISPATCH_ASSIGNMENT_METHOD     varchar(1)         NULL,
     TIME_TABLE_VERSION_ID          numeric(5, 0)      DEFAULT 0 NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKWORK_ASSIGNMENT_CONFIGURATION PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (CONFIGURATION_ID)
     ON MAIN_INDX,
     CONSTRAINT FKTT_VERSION_WA_CONFIGUR FOREIGN KEY (TIME_TABLE_VERSION_ID)
     REFERENCES TIME_TABLE_VERSION(TIME_TABLE_VERSION_ID)
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
CONFIGURATION_ID numeric(10, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each row.
CONFIGURATION_NAME varchar(100) NO The text identification for a version of the configuration.
FILE_VERSION varchar(8) YES The operating system file version that was used to load this configuration into the database.
ROLES_VERSION varchar(8) YES The version identification for the role definition.
DEFAULT_ASSIGN_VERSION varchar(8) YES The default assignments version.
FORCE_ASSIGNMENT_IND varchar(1) YES Y indicates that a vehicle should be assigned, or \"pushed\" to a dispatcher when no dispatchers for that fleet are logged on.
DISPATCH_ASSIGNMENT_METHOD varchar(1) YES The method in which an unassigned vehicle is assigned to a dispatcher for a fleet. Round-robin or Explicit.
TIME_TABLE_VERSION_ID numeric(5, 0) YES A unique number associated with the concepts, messages and parts of a schedule including all the messages associated with the scheduling business area.

Primary and Unique Keys
Key Name Key Type Keys
XPKWORK_ASSIGNMENT_CONFIGURATION PrimaryKey CONFIGURATION_ID

Foreign Keys
Parent Table Child Table Type Foreign Keys
TIME_TABLE_VERSION WORK_ASSIGNMENT_CONFIGURATION Non-Identifying TIME_TABLE_VERSION_ID
WORK_ASSIGNMENT_CONFIGURATION WORK_ASSIGNMENT_ROLE Identifying CONFIGURATION_ID

Storage
STORAGE OPTION STORAGE VALUE
FILEGROUP MAIN_DATA

Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE WORK_ASSIGNMENT_DEFAULT(
     CONFIGURATION_ID     numeric(10, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

     DEFAULT_FLEET_ID     numeric(5, 0)      DEFAULT 0 NULL,

     ON MAIN_INDX,
     CONSTRAINT FKFLEET_WA_DEFAULT FOREIGN KEY (DEFAULT_FLEET_ID)
     REFERENCES FLEET(FLEET_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKWA_ROLE_WA_DEFAULT FOREIGN KEY (CONFIGURATION_ID,ROLE_ID)
     REFERENCES WORK_ASSIGNMENT_ROLE(CONFIGURATION_ID,ROLE_ID)
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

     ON MAIN_INDX,

) ON MAIN_DATA

WORK_PIECE
Definition Each entry defines a piece of work scheduled for an operator. Operator work assignments reflect labor agreements and transit policy considerations. These considerations include platform and layover time and locations, operator paid work time, reporting times, and relief locations and policies. (ST-ITS-TCIP-SCH)
Note
DDL Code CREATE TABLE WORK_PIECE(
     WORK_PIECE_ID             numeric(10, 0)     NOT NULL,
     TIME_TABLE_VERSION_ID     numeric(5, 0)      DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     RUN_ID                    numeric(10, 0)     DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     OPERATING_TIME_ID         numeric(3, 0)      DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     PAY_ID                    numeric(3, 0)      DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
     BEGIN_TIME                numeric(10, 0)     NULL,
     END_TIME                  numeric(10, 0)     NULL,
     CONSTRAINT XPKWORK_PIECE PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (WORK_PIECE_ID)
     ON MAIN_INDX,
     CONSTRAINT FKOPER_TIME_TYPE_WRK_PIECE FOREIGN KEY (OPERATING_TIME_ID)
     REFERENCES OPERATING_TIME_TYPE(OPERATING_TIME_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKPAY_TYPE_WORK_PIECE FOREIGN KEY (PAY_ID)
     REFERENCES PAY_TYPE(PAY_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKRUN_WORK_PIECE FOREIGN KEY (RUN_ID)
     REFERENCES RUN(RUN_ID),
     CONSTRAINT FKTT_VERSION_WORK_PIECE FOREIGN KEY (TIME_TABLE_VERSION_ID)
     REFERENCES TIME_TABLE_VERSION(TIME_TABLE_VERSION_ID)
) ON MAIN_DATA
go

Columns
ColumnName Domain Datatype NULL Definition
WORK_PIECE_ID numeric(10, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record..
TIME_TABLE_VERSION_ID numeric(5, 0) NO A unique number associated with the concepts, messages and parts of a schedule including all the messages associated with the scheduling business area.
RUN_ID numeric(10, 0) NO Identifies the piece of work for an operator on a given day type or within a particular schedule.
OPERATING_TIME_ID numeric(3, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
PAY_ID numeric(3, 0) NO A unique, system-assigned identifier for each record.
BEGIN_TIME numeric(10, 0) YES The beginning time for a sequence of times. Expressed in number of seconds after midnight.
END_TIME numeric(10, 0) YES The ending time for a sequence of times. Expressed as number of seconds after midnight.

Primary and Unique Keys
Key Name Key Type Keys
XPKWORK_PIECE PrimaryKey WORK_PIECE_ID

Foreign Keys
Parent Table Child Table Type Foreign Keys
OPERATING_TIME_TYPE WORK_PIECE Non-Identifying OPERATING_TIME_ID
PAY_TYPE WORK_PIECE Non-Identifying PAY_ID
RUN WORK_PIECE Non-Identifying RUN_ID
TIME_TABLE_VERSION WORK_PIECE Non-Identifying TIME_TABLE_VERSION_ID
WORK_PIECE TRIP Non-Identifying TRIP_ID
WORK_PIECE DAILY_WORK_PIECE Non-Identifying DAILY_WORK_PIECE_ID

Storage
STORAGE OPTION STORAGE VALUE
FILEGROUP MAIN_DATA
